title: FS: T-207 Lot of 5 plus PSA 4
author: OriginalTrekkerMike

posts.post_title: FS: T-207 Lot of 5 plus PSA 4
posts.post_content:
I have the following lot of cards for sale:

Marquard (HOF)
McBride
Milan
Schaefer
Walker

I am asking $200 for the lot.  I also have a PSA 4 Ainsmith available for $70.  If you buy all six cards, I will knock the price down to $250.  All quoted prices include postage and handling.  Emails to [url]METaylor2001@hotmail.com[/url] take precedence over PMs.  Thank you.

[IMG]http://i437.photobucket.com/albums/qq91/OriginalTrekkerMike/For%20Sale%20Or%20Trade/Ainsmith_Front.jpg[/IMG]

[IMG]http://i437.photobucket.com/albums/qq91/OriginalTrekkerMike/For%20Sale%20Or%20Trade/Ainsmith_Rear.jpg[/IMG]

[IMG]http://i437.photobucket.com/albums/qq91/OriginalTrekkerMike/For%20Sale%20Or%20Trade/T-207Lot_Front.jpg[/IMG]

[IMG]http://i437.photobucket.com/albums/qq91/OriginalTrekkerMike/For%20Sale%20Or%20Trade/T-207Lot_Rear.jpg[/IMG]
Bump to the top...Reasonable offers will be considered.
Bump to the top...Reasonable cash or trade offers for cards I need for my Dahlen and Street type card collection will be considered as well.
